definition: Shaoxing wine a.k.a. "yellow wine", traditional Chinese wine made from glutinous rice and wheat
to rise/to flourish/to become popular/to start/to encourage/to get up/(often used in the negative) to permit or allow (dialect)/maybe (dialect)
feeling or desire to do sth/interest in sth/excitement

sentences.english: We like Shao Xing rice wine because it tastes good.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaoxing wine is a sort of rice wine, it is attractive by fragrant , like the Qing wine in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaohsing wine is a kind of arack. It is tasty and smells good, some like Japanese sake.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaoxing wine is regard as the national wine.
Shaoxing wine belongs to rice wine , it tastes wonderful and likes Japan 's wine .
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: Shaohsing wine is made of rice, just like the Tsing wine in Japan, fragrant and sweet in mouth.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒属米酒类，品之香味诱人，有点象日本的清酒。

sentences.english: The history of more than 2400 years of Shaoxing rice wine combined with the Kuaiji Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 绍兴酒2400多年的历史和会稽山息息相关。

definition: "yellow wine" (mulled rice wine, usually served warm)
name of a famous Tang dynasty wine/same as 白酒[bai2 jiu3]
